title: ORKOCommandIntent
description: Structured intent produced by the ORKO command parser.

command.description: Raw natural language command from the user.

action.description: Normalized action key used by the Intent Mapper and Workflow Engine.

parameters.description: Action-specific parameters extracted from the command.

source_channel.description: Where the command came from (chat, email, dashboard, webhook, etc.).

session_id.description: Session identifier for grouping related commands.
